Class Company

  • java.lang.Object
    • Company

  • public class Company
extends java.lang.Object
    Company Class This represents and individual security Each Company has a symbol (ticker) and sector (assigned when classified) There is a hash map used to lookup transactions by date quickly There is a list of transactions for the given security

      Constructor for Company setting the ticker

      Inserts a transaction into the company's list of transactions and hashes the time for fast lookup

      Returns a transaction performed at the given date If there is no transaction from that date, return the closest earlier transaction

        public void insert(Transaction t)
        Inserts a transaction into the company's list of transactions and hashes the time for fast lookup
        Parameters:
        t - the transaction to insert

      • resetTransactionData

        public void resetTransactionData()
        Orders transactions chronologically and rehashes the dates based on the new indices

      • lookupTransaction

        public Transaction lookupTransaction(Date d)
        Returns a transaction performed at the given date If there is no transaction from that date, return the closest earlier transaction
        Parameters:
        d - the date of the transaction to lookup
        Returns:
        a transaction from the company's list
